content: Gore-Eye Daoist can be found after defeating both the Stone Vanguard and Tiger Vanguard bosses. After defeating them, return to the area where you fought the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Price and place the Keenness of Tiger and Keenness of Stone items into the receptacle by the large stone door. Open the door, head down the hill, and over the bridge to reach an open cave area with a statue carved into the rock face.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gore-Eye_Daoist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Gore-Eye Daoist Location'.
The content is as follows:
Gore-Eye Daoist can be found after defeating both the Stone Vanguard and Tiger Vanguard bosses. After defeating them, return to the area where you fought the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Price and place the Keenness of Tiger and Keenness of Stone items into the receptacle by the large stone door. Open the door, head down the hill, and over the bridge to reach an open cave area with a statue carved into the rock face.
